gamerule.blockExplosionDropDecay: In block interaction explosions, some blocks won't drop their loot
gamerule.blockExplosionDropDecay.descrip: Some of the drops from blocks destroyed by explosions caused by block interactions are lost in the explosion.
gamerule.commandModificationBlockLimit.d: Number of blocks that can be changed at once by one command, such as fill or clone.
gamerule.doEntityDrops.description: Controls drops from minecarts (including inventories), item frames, boats, etc.
gamerule.doLimitedCrafting.description: If enabled, players will be able to craft only unlocked recipes.
gamerule.doMobLoot.description: Controls resource drops from mobs, including experience orbs.
gamerule.doMobSpawning.description: Some entities might have separate rules.
gamerule.doTileDrops.description: Controls resource drops from blocks, including experience orbs.
gamerule.doVinesSpread.description: Controls whether or not the Vines block spreads randomly to adjacent blocks. Does not affect other type of vine blocks such as Weeping Vines, Twisting Vines, etc.
gamerule.enderPearlsVanishOnDeath: Thrown ender pearls vanish on death
gamerule.enderPearlsVanishOnDeath.descri: Whether ender pearls thrown by a player vanish when that player dies.
gamerule.forgiveDeadPlayers.description: Angered neutral mobs stop being angry when the targeted player dies nearby.
gamerule.globalSoundEvents.description: When certain game events happen, like a boss spawning, the sound is heard everywhere.
gamerule.lavaSourceConversion.descriptio: When flowing lava is surrounded on two sides by lava sources it converts into a source.
gamerule.maxCommandChainLength.descripti: Applies to command block chains and functions.
gamerule.mobExplosionDropDecay: In mob explosions, some blocks won't drop their loot
gamerule.mobExplosionDropDecay.descripti: Some of the drops from blocks destroyed by explosions caused by mobs are lost in the explosion.
gamerule.playersSleepingPercentage.descr: The percentage of players who must be sleeping to skip the night.
gamerule.snowAccumulationHeight.descript: When it snows, layers of snow form on the ground up to at most this number of layers.
